titles.title: Oh Lord, Give Me The Strength To Go On

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Oh Lord, give me the strength to go on.
Oh Lord, give me the power to overcome.
Help me to go through the Day of Atonement.
Let me see the joy ahead.
Help me to lay down my life,
that I might come forth from the dead.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Oh Lord, I pray that I might not compromise.
Help me to lay all selfishness aside.
Let me see that these afflictions are doing a work in me.
And when the work is complete, we shall set all creation free.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Oh Lord, you have chosen us to be that company
That will blow the trumpet for the year of jubilee.
But first we must suffer, become obedient in all things.
And then we shall reign with Jesus the King of Kings.
